bug.author: binary42
bug.description: Looks like you need to update the CMakeLists.txt to accomadate the re-factored library directory structure. i.e. tiny_cnn/convolutional_layer.h to tiny_cnn/io/convolutional_layer.h , etc.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/binary42>@binary42</denchmark-link>
Thanks for your information! I hope <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mrazekv>@mrazekv</denchmark-link> will fix it on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/pull/67>#67</denchmark-link> :)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/binary42>@binary42</denchmark-link>
I have already fixed it. The new version is in the pull request <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/pull/67>#67</denchmark-link> ;-)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mrazekv>@mrazekv</denchmark-link>
I've merged it. Thank you very much!
